comment:
* APK Signature Scheme v4 verifier.
 *
 * @hide for internal use only.

methods.name: public static VerifiedSigner extractCertificates(String apkFile) throws SignatureNotFoundException, SecurityException
methods.comment:
* Extracts and verifies APK Signature Scheme v4 signatures of the provided APK and returns the
     * certificates associated with each signer.

methods.name: private static VerifiedSigner verifySigner(V4Signature.SigningInfo signingInfo, final byte[] signedData) throws SecurityException
